DOC.brief_summary: This study examine feasibility parent caregiver administer FluMist live intranasal vaccine child home outside traditional medical environment without involvement medical personnel . The study recruit patient family already eligible receive FluMist vaccine . After consent obtain vaccine give family , go home administer vaccine member within 24 hour . Telephone follow within 48 hour confirm vaccine give successfully within 9-12 day assess patient preference give vaccine home adverse event .
DOC.criteria: 1 . The primary caregiver must 18 year age old willing give write informed consent study participation 2 . The primary caregiver must parent legal guardian child live household 3 . All child household 2 17 year age must receive primary care clinic 4 . All child household 2 17 year age must private insurance provide cost influenza vaccination 5 . There must least one member household 2 17 year age , present care clinic , eligible receive Live Attenuated Influenza Vaccine ( LAIV ) whose primary care giver willing administer LAIV clinic supervision 6 . There must least one family member household 2 17 year age , present care clinic , eligible receive LAIV whose primary care giver willing administer LAIV inhome set 7 . There must work refrigerator household 8 . The primary caregiver must work telephone number willing contact study followup telephone email 9 . The primary caregiver available entire study period 12 day follow last dose LAIV administer child 10 . The primary caregiver must agree complete 30 minute post vaccination assessment 8 day diary follow vaccination child receive LAIV . 1 . Children family receive vaccine Vaccines Children program
